arCallbacks.szOnCallbackCompleteScript:
function Start(idActorPlayer, snoSubzone)

	-- Any time a player enters the subzone, wait a second then check
	-- if they need the Elias Finger item. The 1 second wait is to 
	-- allow the "Wake Up Near Lorath" callback to apply variable
	-- in the case the player is just playing naturally since that
	-- callback will handle the item drop in that case
	
	Hydra.Wait(1)
	if not Hydra.IsGameVariableSet("DeltaWashedAshore") then
	
		Hydra.ItemDropAtActor(idBackupItemSpawn, itemEliasFinger)
		Hydra.SetGameVariableFlag("DeltaWashedAshore")
		
	end
	
end

function Start(idActorPlayer, sLevelAreaName)

-- Checks the group to see if anyone has the Elias' Finger
-- instanced quest item. If not, drops one on the ground.

	Hydra.SetGameVariableFlag("DeltaWashedAshore")
	
	local tActors = Hydra.QuestGetParticipants()

	-- check players for items. If one is found, set variable
	for i, PlayerID in ipairs(tActors) do

		Hydra.BuffRemove(powerStun, "STUN_SELF", PlayerID) 
		Hydra.ActorTriggerPowerAtFeet(PlayerID, powerWakeUp)
	
		if Hydra.ActorHasItemByName(PlayerID, itemEliasFinger) then
			bHasItem = true
		end
		
	end
	
	-- if item is not found, drop a copy of the item for a player
	if not bHasItem then
		Hydra.ItemDropAtActor(idBackupItemSpawn, itemEliasFinger)
	end

end

function Start(idActorPlayer, idActorGizmo)

	Hydra.ActorSetConversationStatus(idLorath, false)
	Hydra.Wait(1)
	Hydra.ActorPlaySimpleConversation(conv_LorathReact, idLorath)
	Hydra.ActorClearAnimSetOverride(idLorath)

	Hydra.Wait(4)
	Hydra.ActorSetAnimSetOverride(idNeyrelle, "NPC_Neyrelle_Ground_WakeUp_Phased_campaign")
	Hydra.Wait(8)
	Hydra.ActorPlaySimpleConversation(conv_NeyStirs, idNeyrelle)
	Hydra.WaitForConversationFinished(conv_NeyStirs)
	Hydra.EventSend("NeyrelleAwake")
	
end

function Start(idActorNPC, sConversation, idActorPlayer)

	Hydra.Wait(1)
	
	-- Neyrelle Actions
	Hydra.QActorWait(idNeyrelle, 2)
	Hydra.QActorClearAnimSetOverride(idNeyrelle)
	Hydra.QActorWaitForConversationFinished(idNeyrelle, conv_LorathLeaves)
	--Hydra.QActorWait(idNeyrelle, 1)
	Hydra.QActorMoveToLocationDynamicSpeed(idNeyrelle, locNeyrelleWalkTo, "NPC_Walk_Fast", true)
	Hydra.QActorFadeAndDelete(idNeyrelle, 1)
	
	-- Lorath Actions
	Hydra.QActorWait(idLorath, 0.5)
	Hydra.QActorPlaySimpleConversation(conv_LorathLeaves, idLorath)
	Hydra.QActorMoveToLocationDynamicSpeed(idLorath, locLorathFireKickWalkTo, "NPC_Walk", true)
	Hydra.QActorAnim(idLorath, powerDonanKick)
	Hydra.WaitForQEmpty(idLorath)
	Hydra.ActorFadeAndDelete(idCampfire, 0.5)
	Hydra.ActorEnable(idCampfireExtinguished)
	Hydra.QActorWaitForConversationFinished(idLorath, conv_LorathLeaves)
	Hydra.QActorMoveToLocationDynamicSpeed(idLorath, locLorathMoveTo, "NPC_Walk_Fast", true)
	Hydra.QActorFadeAndDelete(idLorath, 1)
	
	Hydra.WaitForQEmpty(idNeyrelle)
	Hydra.EventSend("NPCsGone")
end

szOnStartupScript:
bItemDropped = false
bHasItem = false
bFreshStartItemGiven = false
itemEliasFinger = Hydra.ReferenceItem("QST_Hawe_Delta_EliasFinger")
